name: Knock Off Blood Feud
description:
A game about a blood feud made for Ludum Dare 47. 

It's very rushed as I am very busy right now. But I may update the game closer to the end of the year when I have more time. 

Enjoy!!!

Note: 

If you are here from ludum dare, download and judge "Knockoff Blood Feud.zip" 

Knockoff Blood Feud 1.1 contains some minor quality of life improvements that were made outside of the jam hours such as: a screen indicating if you have died, a screen indicating if you have won, and some other minor changes.
